page.title: 02THORNTON COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: In 1968 after discussion with the Parish Council it was decided to form a committee to raise the money for the village hall.After looking at other halls in the county plans were drawn up and money started to be raised.The main fund raising efforts were dances at Bagworth Institute,bazaars,bingo, whist & fetes. During this time the committee were in touch with the Parish Council who gave them a grant for a quarter of the money required and the Rural Community Council who helped to obtain a 50% from the Department of Education & Science .The Community Centre was opened on Saturday 8th.of September 1973, it took 4 years to raise Â£15,500. About 500 people use the Community Centre every week from all age groups.
